channel.title: Works on trinkchocolate
channel.description: Recent content in Works on trinkchocolate

item.title: Bare Minimum
item.description: Whats in this theme? Not much. Just enough to get the job done. Um .. and in detail? Some HTML Templates A little bit of flexbox-CSS Some snippets of JS .. providing the following awesome features: Templates: The page content is created in markdown, a general content description language. Hugo generates the final website out of the template and the content, at your service. Configurable: Using a single .

item.title: Non Blog
item.description: trinkchocolate declares itself as a non-blog theme. This does not mean that there is no capability to publish posts into a blog-like archive, it is just not the focus. The included archive is meant for two things: Representating current / finished projects and spreading news. But the “blog” will never be the center of the page. Use other templates for that.
